headline: Why These 3 Automotive & Industrial Chip Stocks Just Soared
summary: See why these three automotive and industrial chip stocks just soared. Analysts see over 30% potential in one name with robotics upside.

headline: Has Microchip’s Recent 18% Surge Run Ahead of Its Fundamentals in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Microchip Technology is a quiet bargain or a value trap at today’s price, you are not alone. This breakdown is designed to give you a clear, no-nonsense view of where it really stands. The stock has bounced sharply, with gains of 18.8% over the last week, 19.7% over the last month, and 18.4% year to date, even though its 3-year return is still negative at -6.4%. These moves come as investors refocus on semiconductors tied to industrial, automotive, and embedded...
